Text.val: 23.01.2007 SH SCR12212 BXA410A If no ACCT row exists <book_date> and
<value_date> are updated with blank now, wrong pictures were written to XML
23.01.2006 SH SCR10032 BXA401A update <text> with "Starting balance" and uses
29.12.2005 SH SCR9947 BXA401 Added check to write TCOD only if ACCC rows exists
08.11.2005 SH SCR9450 BXA401B Added missing contents for <text>
-- Path and Filenames for Templates and Outputfiles
-- Store user language, uses to switch back if report was produced in another
-- Get directories and convert them to OS Format (Windows/AS400)
-- Start producing XML File if no error occurs
-- Write COUT rows to TCOD if table TCOD is empty for report type = MOV
-- Handle one client in a separate transaction
-- Set system language to report language
-- Copy final XML File to tamino queue
-- Copy of final XML File failed
-- Only if FinalFile was copied to TaminoQueue by UFB523
-- Build filename for temporary XML Files
-- Build final filename for the XML File
-- Get the first ACCOUNT_STATEMENT for the selected client
- Calculate balances which has to be written to XML
... get amounts from CMON for PI.DATE
... get amounts from CMOC for PI.DATE
... first calculate totals for this year which have to be written to XML

SQL_STMT_U.val: select cast(sum(CMON_TOTNDEBTNOTESNEWMAN + CMON_TOTNDEBTNOTESNEWAUTO) as decimal(9)), cast(sum(CMON_TOTNCREDNOTESNEWMAN + CMON_TOTNCREDNOTESNEWAUTO) as decimal(9)), cast(sum(CMON_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMON_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO - CMON_TOTSALCREDNOTESMAN - CMON_TOTSALCREDNOTESAUTO) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_TOTAPAYCR) as decimal(13,2)), cast(sum(CMON_TOTINTERESTINCOME) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CMON where CMON_ADMNO = :2 and CMON_CLNTNO = :3 and CMON_YEAR = :4 and CMON_MONTH <= :5 and CMON_CURRENCY = ':6' for fetch only optimize for 100 rows

select cast(sum(CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESMAN + CMOC_TOTSALDEBTNOTESAUTO - CMOC_TOTSALCREDNOTESMAN - CMOC_TOTSALCREDNOTESAUTO) as decimal(13,2)) from :1/CMOC where CMOC_ADMNO = :2 and CMOC_CLNTNO = :3 and CMOC_YEAR = :4 and CMOC_MONTH <= :5 and CMOC_CURRENCY = ':6' and CMOC_COUNTRY = ':7' for fetch only optimize for 100 rows
